info.description: Atlas is DoROAD's flagship Global Travel and Aviation Intelligence Data API. Version 2.0 represents a significant leap forward, providing a comprehensive, high-performance RESTful API for accessing detailed country information, extensive airport data, and up-to-date passport visa requirements worldwide. This service offers extensive data about countries (demographics, geography, international codes, etc.), airports, and visa regulations for various passports.
info.title: Atlas - Global Travel and Aviation Intelligence Data API by DoROAD

get.description: Retrieves a list of all airlines.
Retrieves all airlines that are currently active.
Retrieves all airlines based in a specific country.
Retrieves an airline by its IATA code.
Retrieves an airline by its ICAO code.
Retrieves a specific airline by its ID.
Performs a flexible search for airlines based on a query string.

parameters.description: Search string (can match airline name, country, ICAO/IATA code, etc.)
parameters.name: query

get.description: Retrieves a list of all airports for all countries (keyed by each country's alpha-2 code).
Retrieves a specific airport by its ICAO or IATA code.
get.summary: Get airport by ICAO or IATA code

get.description: Calculates the distance (in kilometers and miles) between two airports.

parameters.description: ICAO or IATA code of the first airport
parameters.name: airport1

parameters.description: ICAO or IATA code of the second airport
parameters.name: airport2

get.description: Retrieves all airports associated with a specific keyword.
Retrieves all airports within a specific municipality.
Retrieves all airports within a specified radius of a given latitude/longitude coordinate.
Retrieves all airports within a specific ISO region.
Retrieves all airports that have scheduled airline service.
Performs a flexible search for airports based on a query string.

parameters.description: Search string (can match airport name, city, ICAO/IATA code, etc.)
parameters.name: query

get.description: Retrieves all airports of a specific type.
Retrieves all airports in a specific country. The country code can be in any recognized format (CCA2, CCA3, CCN3, CIOC, FIFA, or alt spelling).
Retrieves a specific airport within a country by matching the airport's ICAO or IATA code. The country code can be in any recognized format (CCA2, CCA3, CCN3, CIOC, etc.).
get.summary: Get a single airport by identifier

Retrieves detailed runway information for a specific airport.

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response

get.description: Retrieves flights for [icao24] in [begin, end], up to 30 days.
Retrieves flights that arrived at [airport] in [begin, end], up to 7 days.
Retrieves flights that departed [airport] in [begin, end], up to 7 days.
Retrieves flights for a short interval [begin, end], max 2 hours.
Requires Basic Auth. Retrieves the state vectors from your own sensors only.
get.summary: Get states for your own sensors

parameters.description: Time can be Unix, RFC3339, or negative/relative (default=0 => now)
parameters.name: time

get.description: Retrieves the state vectors for aircraft at a given time (or 0 for "now"). Optional: filter by icao24 or bounding box.

parameters.description: Time can be Unix, RFC3339, or negative/relative (default=0 => now)
parameters.name: time

get.description: Retrieves the trajectory for an aircraft [icao24] at time t. If t=0 => live track.

parameters.description: Time can be Unix, RFC3339, or negative/relative (0 => live track)
parameters.name: time

get.description: Get complete visa requirement data for all countries
Get destinations that are visa-free for multiple passports
Get visa requirements for all passports visiting a specific destination
Get sorted visa requirements for all passports visiting a specific destination

parameters.description: Sort field (passport_country, visa_requirement, allowed_stay, iso2, iso3)
parameters.name: sort_by

get.description: Get visa requirements for a specific passport
Get all visa requirements for a specific passport (same as /visas/passport/:passportCode)

get.description: Get list of countries that offer e-visa for a specific passport
Get list of countries that are visa-free for a specific passport
Get list of countries that offer visa on arrival for a specific passport

Get global passport rankings based on visa-free access
Get mutual visa requirements between two countries
Get detailed visa requirements for a passport holder from one country traveling to another, using visas.json data primarily and falling back to passports.json if needed.
get.summary: Get visa requirements between two countries (enhanced)

parameters.description: Origin country code (e.g., USA, US, 840, etc.)
parameters.name: fromCountry

parameters.description: Destination country code (e.g., DEU, DE, 276, etc.)
parameters.name: toCountry

v2.Airline.description: Airline represents data for a single airline.

v2.AirportDistance.description: AirportDistance represents the distance between two airports.

v2.AirportFrequency.description: AirportFrequency represents the frequency data for an airport.

v2.AirportRunway.description: AirportRunway represents the runway data for an airport.

v2.CountryAirports.description: CountryAirports represents the airport data for a country.

keywords.example: Airports in Saint Vincent and the Grenadines

iso2.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code (e.g., "VC" for Saint Vincent and the Grenadines).

iso3.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code (e.g., "VCT" for Saint Vincent and the Grenadines).

region.description: Geographic region the country belongs to (e.g., "Americas").

subregion.description: Geographic subregion the country belongs to (e.g., "Caribbean").

date-published.description: Date and time when the advisory was published.

has-advisory-warning.description: Flag indicating if there's an advisory warning (1 = yes, 0 = no).

has-content.description: Flag indicating if there's content associated with the advisory (1 = yes, 0 = no).

has-regional-advisory.description: Flag indicating if there are regional advisories (1 = yes, 0 = no).

recent-updates-type.description: Description of the most recent update.

codes.description: Various codes associated with the country (ISO2, ISO3, region, subregion).

passport_index.description: Information about the passport ranking of this country.

requirements.description: List of visa requirements for citizens of this country traveling to other countries.

visa_map.description: Information about the visa map image, including URL and legend.

wiki_url.description: URL to the Wikipedia page detailing visa requirements for citizens of this country.

iso2.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code of the passport country.

iso3.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code of the passport country.

notes.description: Additional notes about the visa requirement.

v2.EnhancedVisaRequirement.description: EnhancedVisaRequirement represents the detailed visa requirement between two countries.

ranking.description: Passport ranking.  This is a pointer to allow for null values (no ranking data).

ranking_source.description: Source of the passport ranking (e.g., "Henley Passport Index").

visa_free_count.description: Number of countries accessible visa-free with this passport.

passportCode.description: The ISO3 code of the passport's country.

rank.description: The passport's rank (1 being the highest).

visaFreeCount.description: The number of countries accessible visa-free.

v2.PassportResponse.description: PassportResponse represents the passport data response.

date.description: Human-readable date and time of the publication.

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp of the publication date.

advisory-text.description: Advisory text (e.g., "Avoid all travel", "Exercise normal security precautions").

name.description: Country name in the specific language.

recent-updates.description: Description of the most recent update.

url-slug.description: URL-friendly slug of the country name.

requirements.description: List of visa requirements for all passports visiting the destination, sorted.

sorted_by.description: Field by which the requirements are sorted.

requirements.description: List of visa requirements for all passports visiting the destination.

legend.description: Legend explaining the color coding of the visa map.

map_url.description: URL to the visa map image.

v2.VisaRequirement.description: VisaRequirement represents the visa requirement between two countries.

allowed_stay.description: Allowed duration of stay (e.g., "90 days", "30 days").

iso2.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code of the destination country.

iso3.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code of the destination country.

notes.description: Additional notes about the visa requirement.
